item.title: By: Carlos Antonio
item.dc:creator: Carlos Antonio
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/07/ruby-blocks-precedence/comment-page-1/#comment-1421">Fuad Saud</a>.
Thanks for sharing. We don't particularly follow that as a convention, but it's good for people to know that it exists and have it in mind :).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fuad Saud.

Thanks for sharing. We don’t particularly follow that as a convention, but it’s good for people to know that it exists and have it in mind :).
